==Description==
This [[Conditional Tags|Conditional Tag]] checks when in Comments Popup window. This is a boolean function, meaning it returns either TRUE or FALSE.

==Usage==

==Parameters==

==Return Values==
; <tt>(boolean)</tt> : True on success, false on failure.
